Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.utils

Interface MeasureI

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, TimingI
All Known Subinterfaces:
HeaterMeasureI
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompoundMeasure, HeaterCompoundMeasure, HeaterStateMeasure, Measure
public interface MeasureI extends TimingI, Serializable
The class MeasureI mainly marks classes from which instance of measures are represented; the two major subclasses currently proposed represent scalar and compound measures (made of scalar measures), hence the presence of the method isScalar().

Description

White-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-11-27

Author:
Jacques Malenfant
